text: The 1992 Philadelphia Phillies season was a season in Major League Baseball. The Phillies finished sixth in the National League East with a record of 70 wins and 92 losses. ==Offseason== * December 8, 1991: Von Hayes was traded by the Phillies to the California Angels for Rubén Amaro, Jr. and Kyle Abbott.Rubén Amaro at Baseball Reference * December 9, 1991: Danny Cox was signed as a free agent by the Phillies.Danny Cox at Baseball Reference * December 10, 1991: Mariano Duncan was signed as a free agent by the Phillies.Mariano Duncan at Baseball Reference * December 11, 1991: Bruce Ruffin was traded by the Phillies to the Milwaukee Brewers for Dale Sveum.Dale Sveum at Baseball Reference * January 8, 1992: The Phillies traded a player to be named later to the New York Yankees for Darrin Chapin. The Phillies completed the deal by sending Charlie Hayes to the Yankees on February 19.Charlie Hayes at Baseball Reference * January 8, 1992: Rick Schu was signed as a free agent by the Phillies.Rick Schu at Baseball Reference ==Regular season== On September 20, Mickey Morandini executed an unassisted triple play in the sixth inning.http://www.baseball-almanac.com/feats/feats8.shtml He caught a line drive, touched second base and tagged the runner coming from first base. ===Notable transactions=== * April 2, 1992: Jason Grimsley was traded by the Phillies to the Houston Astros for Curt Schilling.Curt Schilling at Baseball Reference * April 5, 1992: Steve Lake was signed as a free agent by the Phillies.Steve Lake at Baseball Reference * June 1, 1992: Bobby Estalella was drafted by the Phillies in the 23rd round of the 1992 Major League Baseball draft. Player signed May 9, 1993.Bobby Estalella at Baseball Reference * June 7, 1992: Danny Cox was released by the Phillies. * August 10, 1992: Dale Sveum was traded by the Phillies to the Chicago White Sox for Keith Shepherd.Dale Sveum at Baseball Reference * August 11, 1992: Steve Scarsone was traded by the Phillies to the Baltimore Orioles for Juan Bell.Juan Bell at Baseball Reference ===Season
